745060.name: Hunter of Antiques
745060.description:
Just one wrong step and you die
Hunter of antiques is a hardcore platformer adventure
If you loving run, jump, traps and corridors this game is for you.

explore dungeon corridors, overcome the traps .

Hidden corridors in the dungeon hide secrets and traps. It is up to you to examine the entire prison and find secrets in these forgotten corridors that hide traps, just one wrong step and you die. Be careful at every step.

Explore the dungeon

Explore all levels, every corner

Watch out for traps

  • Spikes
  • Holes
  • Trick floors
  • Lava
  • Labyrinths
745060.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
